text: Loo is a village in the municipality of Duiven in the province of Gelderland, the Netherlands. Loo has 1,120 inhabitants (2018). The village has a ferry connection to Huissen. Some houses of Loo are part of Huissen, Lingewaard. title: Loo, Duiven
